channel.title: Coloring pages for children on Game6r

item.title: Happy Crayons
item.description: The game for kids Coloring invites all lovers of creative pursuits to try their hand at creating a cute picture. On the screen you will see an image of a cute cat, and you will need to color it. To do this, choose any shade from the proposed palette, and then click on the area of ​​the screen that should become colored. But coloring is not limited to coloring only!
